snippet: Ignoring a warning from the business lobby, Swiss citizens voted to give shareholders a binding say on the overall pay packages for executives and directors.
abstract: Swiss citizens vote to impose some of world's most severe restrictions on executive compensation, ignoring warning from business lobby that such curbs will undermine country’s investor-friendly image.
lead_paragraph: Ignoring a warning from the business lobby, Swiss citizens voted to give shareholders a binding say on the overall pay packages for executives and directors.

headline.seo: Voters Tighten Limits on Executive Pay in Switzerland
headline.main: Swiss Voters Approve a Plan to Severely Limit Executive Compensation
headline.print_headline: Swiss Voters Approve a Plan to Severely Limit Executive Compensation
